industries.description: Field that involves the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in the development of machinery, devices, or systems.
Industry involved in the maintenance or improvement of health via the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease, illness, injury, and other physical and mental impairments.
Sector involved in the design, development, manufacturing, marketing, and selling of motor vehicles.
Industry encompassing accommodation, food and beverage services, and entertainment to meet the needs of travelers and tourists.
Sector dedicated to the teaching, training, and development of knowledge and skills for personal or professional pursuits.
Industry involved in the process of selling consumer goods or services to customers through multiple channels of distribution.
Sector focused on the production and supply of power, including electricity, natural gas, and renewable energy sources.
Field involved in cultivating land, raising crops, and rearing livestock for food, fiber, biofuel, and other products.
Sector involved in the exchange of information over significant distances by electronic means, including through mediums such as telephones and the internet.
Industry encompassing the creation, production, and distribution of content for the purposes of entertainment, advertising, or information dissemination.
